full_summary:
**Notice for Request for Proposal: MAR Tech Electrical Specialist Courses**
===========================================================

**Title:** W0103-249464
---------


*   **Publication Date:** December 4, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 30, 2024, at 2:00 PM Pacific Time
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4137018420


**Overview:**
------------

The Department of National Defence, Royal Canadian Navy (DND RCN) invites proposals from qualified contractors to provide on-campus courses and labs for the delivery and instruction of the Marine Technician Electrical Specialist (MARTECH ELECSPEC) program.

**Program Requirements:**

*   The contractor must deliver one serial course in the first year and two serial courses in the subsequent years.
*   The first course is scheduled to begin in May 2024.

**Key Deliverables:**

*   On-campus courses and labs for MARTECH ELECSPEC program
*   Instructional services for the designated courses

**Eligibility:**

*   This opportunity is open to Canadian and international bidders


**Evaluation Criteria:**

*   Proposals will be evaluated based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements:**

*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Notice URL:** 
[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18184286?extsite=MTgxODQyODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18184286?extsite=MTgxODQyODZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
